languages.text:
The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646} penalty, or on their next turn they will spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move as close as possible toward the psyker. They can act as normal, but all their MP are spent on moving toward the psyker.
At the end of their turn, the target must make the Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} again, otherwise they remain under this effect.
languages.original_text:
Цели необходимо пройти {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646}. В случае провала в свой следующий ход цель будет пытаться переместиться как можно ближе к псайкеру, расходуя на это все свои {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очки передвижения{/g} (в остальном в этом ходу она сможет действовать обычным образом).
В конце своего хода цели потребуется снова пройти проверку Воли на сопротивление, иначе эффект сохранится.

traits.locale_text:
The target must pass a Willpower resistance test with a -<u>(5 × psy rating)</u> penalty, or at their next turn they will spend all their movement points to move as close as possible toward the Psyker. They can act as normal, but all their MP are spent on moving toward the Psyker.
At the end of their turn, the target must make the Willpower resistance test again, otherwise they remain under this effect.

The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646} penalty, or on their next turn they will spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move as close as possible toward the psyker. They can act as normal, but all their MP are spent on moving toward the psyker.
At the end of their turn, the target must make the Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} again, otherwise they remain under this effect.

The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a -{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, or at their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} they will spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move as close as possible toward the Psyker. They can act as normal, but all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are spent on moving toward the Psyker.
At the end of their turn, the target must make the Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} again, otherwise they remain under this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.

The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646} penalty, or on their next turn they will spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move as close as possible toward the psyker. They can act as normal, but all their MP are spent on moving toward the psyker.
At the end of their turn, the target must make the Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} again, otherwise they remain under this effect.

languages.text:
目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646}减值。若检定失败，目标下回合将会耗尽所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，尽可能地靠近灵能者。目标其余行动不会受到影响，但所有移动点数都会用来靠近灵能者。
当目标回合结束时，需要再次进行意志抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。若检定失败，该目标依然会受到此效果的影响。

The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646} penalty, or on their next turn they will spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move as close as possible toward the psyker. They can act as normal, but all their MP are spent on moving toward the psyker.
At the end of their turn, the target must make the Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} again, otherwise they remain under this effect.

traits.locale_text:
目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会遭受-<u>（5×灵能等级）</u>减值。若检定失败，目标下回合将会耗尽所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，尽可能地靠近灵能者。目标其余行动不会受到影响，但所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}都会用来靠近灵能者。
当目标回合结束时，需要再次进行意志抗性检定。若检定失败，该目标依然会受到此效果的影响。

目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，此次检定会遭受-{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646}减值。若检定失败，目标下回合将会耗尽所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，尽可能地靠近灵能者。目标其余行动不会受到影响，但所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}都会用来靠近灵能者。
当目标回合结束时，需要再次进行意志抗性检定。若检定失败，该目标依然会受到此效果的影响。

目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若检定失败，目标下{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}将会耗尽所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，尽可能地靠近灵能者。目标其余行动不会受到影响，但所有移动点数都会用来靠近灵能者。
当目标回合结束时，需要再次进行意志抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。若检定失败，该目标依然会受到此效果的影响。

languages.text:
El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646}, o de lo contrario en su próximo turno gastará todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} para acercarse al psíquico tanto como le resulte posible. Podrá actuar con normalidad, pero todos sus PM se gastarán moviéndose hacia el psíquico.
Al final de su turno, el objetivo debe repetir la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de Voluntad; si no la supera, este efecto permanecerá en vigor.

The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646} penalty, or on their next turn they will spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move as close as possible toward the psyker. They can act as normal, but all their MP are spent on moving toward the psyker.
At the end of their turn, the target must make the Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} again, otherwise they remain under this effect.

traits.locale_text:
El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646}, o de lo contrario en su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} gastará todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} para acercarse al psíquico tanto como le resulte posible. Podrá actuar con normalidad, pero todos sus PM se gastarán moviéndose hacia el psíquico.
Al final de su turno, el objetivo debe repetir la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de Voluntad; si no la supera, este efecto permanecerá en vigor.

El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una penalización de -{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646}, o de lo contrario en su próximo turno gastará todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} para acercarse al psíquico tanto como le resulte posible. Podrá actuar con normalidad, pero todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} se gastarán moviéndose hacia el psíquico.
Al final de su turno, el objetivo debe repetir la prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad; si no la supera, este efecto permanecerá en vigor.

languages.text:
Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem Abzug von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646} bestehen. Andernfalls verbraucht es mit dem nächsten Zug sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g}, um dem Psioniker so nahe wie möglich zu kommen. Das Ziel hat dabei keinerlei Einschränkungen, aber die BP werden komplett verbraucht, um sich dem Psioniker zu nähern.
Am Ende seines Zugs muss das Ziel die {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf Willenskraft erneut absolvieren, dauert dieser Effekt weiter an.
languages.original_text:
The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646} penalty, or on their next turn they will spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move as close as possible toward the psyker. They can act as normal, but all their MP are spent on moving toward the psyker.
At the end of their turn, the target must make the Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} again, otherwise they remain under this effect.

traits.locale_text:
Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646} bestehen, sonst wird es im nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} dafür verwenden, dem Psioniker so nahe wie möglich zu kommen. Es unterliegt dabei keinen Einschränkungen, aber die BP werden komplett verbraucht, um sich dem Psioniker zu nähern.
Am Ende seines Zugs muss das Ziel die Willenskraft-Widerstands-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} erneut absolvieren, sonst hat dieser Effekt weiter Bestand.

Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646} bestehen, da es andernfalls bei der nächsten Runde sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} dafür verwenden wird, dem Psioniker so nahe wie möglich zu kommen. Es unterliegt dabei keinen Einschränkungen, aber die {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} werden komplett verbraucht, um sich dem Psioniker zu nähern.
Am Ende seiner Runde muss das Ziel die Widerstandsprobe erneut absolvieren, da dieser Effekt ansonsten weiter Bestand hat.

languages.text:
La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646}, faute de quoi, lors de son tour suivant, elle dépensera tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} pour se rapprocher le plus possible du psyker. Elle pourra agir normalement, mais tous ses PD seront utilisés pour se rapprocher du psyker.
À la fin de son tour, la cible doit repasser le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance de Force mentale, sinon cet effet ne se dissipe pas.

The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646} penalty, or on their next turn they will spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move as close as possible toward the psyker. They can act as normal, but all their MP are spent on moving toward the psyker.
At the end of their turn, the target must make the Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} again, otherwise they remain under this effect.

traits.locale_text:
La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646}, faute de quoi, lors de son tour suivant, elle dépensera tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} pour se rapprocher le plus possible du psyker. Elle pourra agir normalement, mais tous ses PD seront utilisés pour se rapprocher du psyker.
À la fin de son tour, la cible doit repasser le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance de Force mentale, sinon cet effet ne se dissipe pas.

La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} avec une pénalité de -{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646} ou, lors de son tour suivant, elle dépensera tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} pour se rapprocher le plus possible du Psyker. Elle pourra agir normalement, mais tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} seront utilisés pour son rapprochement du Psyker.
À la fin de son tour, la cible doit repasser le test de résistance lié à la Volonté, sinon cet effet ne se dissipe pas.

languages.text:
ターゲットは−{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646}のペナルティを受けた状態で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WIL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならない。失敗した場合、その次のターンにすべての{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を消費して、この異能者へ向かって出来る限り近づかなければならない。通常通り行動できるが、MPは異能者への移動にすべて消費される。
そのターン終了時、そのターゲットは再度WIL抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を行わなければならず、失敗するとこの効果が解除されない。

В случае провала в свой следующий ход цель будет пытаться переместиться как можно ближе к псайкеру, расходуя на это все свои {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очки передвижения{/g} (в остальном в этом ходу она сможет действовать обычным образом).

В конце своего хода цели потребуется снова пройти проверку Воли на сопротивление, иначе {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} сохранится.

languages.text:
Hedef, −{uip|ResistancePenalty|37a95446c4e74c77bf46439923527646} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde bir sonraki turunda ruhsezere mümkün olduğunca yaklaşabilmek için tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanlarını{/g} harcar. Normal eylem gerçekleştirebilir ancak tüm HP'Sini ruhsezere doğru hareket etmek için harcar.
Hedef, turu sona erdiğinde İrade direnç {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testine{/g} tekrar girer. Yine geçemezse bu etkinin altında kalmaya devam eder.
languages.original_text:

They can act as normal, but all their MP are spent on moving toward the psyker.
At the end of their turn, the target must make the Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} again, otherwise they remain under this effect.
